title: Is Donald Glover The Messiah? Congresswoman Stacey Trash 2.27.18
itunes:title: Is Donald Glover The Messiah? Congresswoman Stacey Trash 2.27.18
description:
In episode 93, Miles & guest host Edgar Momplaisir are joined by comedian Blake Wexler to discuss future space wars, Delta dumping the NRA, Donald Glover's New Yorker interview, Stacey Dash for congress, Bachelor contestants with STD's, & more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
